solution_line_template: The number of open parking spots on the second level is {spots_level1} spots + {more_spots_level2} spots = <<{spots_level1}+{more_spots_level2}={spots_level2}>>{spots_level2} spots.
The number of open parking spots on the third level is {spots_level2} spots + {more_spots_level3} spots = <<{spots_level2}+{more_spots_level3}={spots_level3}>>{spots_level3} spots.

There are {spots_level1} spots + {spots_level2} spots + {spots_level3} spots + {spots_level4} spots = <<{spots_level1}+{spots_level2}+{spots_level3}+{spots_level4}={total_spots}>>{total_spots} open parking spots in all.
